info.title: Activate a tab in a tab list in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnSecondTab
setupScript.description: sets focus on the second tab
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the second tab
testPageDocument.querySelector('#agnes').focus();

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Agnes Obel' tab, activate the tab.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Agnes Obel' tab, activate the tab.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn on the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: State of the tab, 'selected', is conveyed
